import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function BlogView(){const[sortBy,setSortBy]=useState('latest');const handleSort=useCallback(newSort=>{setSortBy(newSort);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DashboardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",mb:5,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",flexGrow:1,children:"Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"inherit",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Iconify,{icon:"mingcute:add-line"}),children:"New post"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",sx:{mb:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostSearch,{posts:_posts}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostSort,{sortBy:sortBy,onSort:handleSort,options:[{value:'latest',label:'Latest'},{value:'popular',label:'Popular'},{value:'oldest',label:'Oldest'}]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:_posts.map((post,index)=>{const latestPostLarge=index===0;const latestPost=index===1||index===2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{xs:12,sm:latestPostLarge?12:6,md:latestPostLarge?6:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostItem,{post:post,latestPost:latestPost,latestPostLarge:latestPostLarge})},post.id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{count:10,color:"primary",sx:{mt:8,mx:'auto'}})]});}
